Hora Extra

  • John Maddog Hall in Rio and the First Hora Extra in Buenos Aires.

    • Postado em 20/02/2013
    • 7 comentários

    Tonight my dear friends in Rio have the privilege to welcome Mr. John Maddog Hall in another #horaextra. And tomorrow night, I'll have the privilege to make new friends in Buenos Aires, because it's time for the First Hora Buenos Aires (...)
